DataElement.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire Past Seven Days Hours Missed From Work Because of Health Problems Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how many hours they have missed from work in the past seven days because of health problems.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire Past Week Hours Missed from Work Because of Health Problems
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format._The most recent week, including today._A question about how many hours an individual missed from work because of their health problems.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Concepts.longName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Hours Missed from Work Because of Health Problems
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about how many hours an individual missed from work because of their health problems.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Hours Missed from Work Because of Health Problems
Concepts.definition: A question about how many hours an individual missed from work because of their health problems.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: WPAI-GH:Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire-General Health V2.0. Reilly MC, Zbrozek AS, Dukes EM., 1993.
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study CC003 in Rave per request by R.Bonanni. mc 8/28/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the number to represent a unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.origin: CALGB CRF:Cancer and Leukemia Group B Case Report Form
